name: Simple Project Management - Notion template
description: Organize all your projects in Notion to actually get things done!Easily manage your personal and team projects to get more productive with this ready-to-use Notion template.What you'll get? One simple and powerful template to organize all your projects. ✔️ Manage unlimited projects ✔️ Dashboards for each project ✔️ Project progression tracker✔️ Add and assign unlimited tasks✔️ Project views: Gallery, Kanban board, Timeline✔️ Task views: Today, This week, Overdue✔️ Archive system to keep it clean
